Intro.Title: AIGVerse: Values Navigator
Intro.Text1:
Ah... you've arrived. 
Welcome, brave one.
Intro.Text2:
I am Aroha, the wizard of
the AIGVerse and here to
guide you.
Intro.Text3:
Use knowledge, wisdom and
empathy as your guiding
force through this journey.

InputName.Title: Welcome Rakshak!
InputName.Tagline: Your mission of care begins now.
